mapper.select:
select wk_no, wk_dt, prod_fg, prdt_cd, ist_qty, wk_qty, infer_qty, prdt_lot, prcs_cd, indica_deta_no, indica_no, indica_dt
from prcs_pr_m

SELECT id.INDICA_DETA_NO, id.INDICA_NO, id.INDICA_DT, id.PLAN_DETA_NO, id.PRDT_CD, id.PROD_FG, id.INDICA_QTY, id.WK_ORD, id.WK_DT, id.PLAN_DT, i.INDICA_NM, (SELECT PRDT_NM FROM PRDT WHERE PRDT_CD = id.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_NM FROM INDICA i, INDICA_D id WHERE i.INDICA_NO = id.INDICA_NO AND i.INDICA_DT = id.INDICA_DT
AND TRUNC(i.INDICA_DT) = #{sDate}

select rsc_con_no, prdt_lot, prcs_cd, low_st, (select cmmn_cd_nm from cmmn_data_d where cmmn_cd_deta_id=(select distinct prdt_cd from prdt_stc where prdt_lot=r.prdt_lot)) AS prdt_nm from rsc_clot r where prdt_lot in (select prdt_lot from prdt_stc where indica_deta_no = #{indicaDetaNo}) and prcs_cd = '0' order by rsc_con_no

select rsc_con_no, prdt_lot, prcs_cd, eqm_cd, wk_no, wk_dt, low_st, (select prcs_ord from prcs_pr where eqm_cd = (select distinct eqm_cd from prcs where eqm_cd=r.eqm_cd)) AS prcs_ord, (select cmmn_cd_nm from cmmn_data_d where cmmn_cd_deta_id=(select distinct prdt_cd from prdt_stc where prdt_lot=r.prdt_lot)) AS prdt_nm from rsc_clot r where prdt_lot in (select prdt_lot from prdt_stc where indica_deta_no = #{indicaDetaNo}) order by rsc_con_no
select rsc_con_no, indica_deta_no, rsc_lot, rsc_con_qty from rsc_con where indica_deta_no= #{indicaDetaNo}
select distinct pc.* from prcs pc join prcs_pr pp on pc.prcs_cd = pp.prcs_cd join prdt pd on pd.prdt_cd = pp.prdt_cd where pd.prdt_cd = #{prdtCd} order by 1
select pp.prcs_ord, pp.prdt_cd, pp.eqm_cd, pp.prcs_cd, p.prcs_nm, p.prcs_desct from prcs p, prcs_pr pp where p.prcs_cd=pp.prcs_cd and p.prcs_cd=#{prcsCd} order by eqm_cd
mapper.insert:
(select nvl(max(wk_no),0)+1 as wkNo from prcs_pr_m)
insert into prcs_pr_m (wk_no, wk_dt, prod_fg, prdt_cd, prcs_cd, indica_deta_no, indica_no, indica_dt ) values( TO_NUMBER(#{wkNo}), sysdate, #{prodFg}, #{prdtCd}, #{prcsCd}, #{indicaDetaNo}, #{indicaNo}, TO_DATE(#{indicaDt},'YYYY/MM/DD') )

insert into rslt ( rslt_no, prdt_cd, emp_id, prcs_cd, ist_qty, rslt_qty, infer_qty fr_tm, to_tm, wk_no, wk_dt ) values ( (select nvl(max(rsc_con_no),0)+1 as rscConNo from rsc_clot), #{prdtCd}, #{empId}, #{prcsCd}, #{istQty}, #{rsltQty}, #{inferQty}, TO_DATE(#{frTm},'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{toTm},'HH24:MI:SS'), #{wkNo}, #{wkDt} )
mapper.update: update rsc_clot set low_st = 'C' where prdt_lot=#{prdtLot}
mapper.insert: insert into rsc_clot(rsc_con_no, prdt_lot, prcs_cd, eqm_cd, low_st, wk_no, wk_dt, prcs_fr_tm, prcs_to_tm) values( (select nvl(max(rsc_con_no),0)+1 as rscConNo from rsc_clot), #{prdtLot}, #{prcsCd}, #{eqmCd}, #{lowSt}, #{wkNo}, sysdate, TO_DATE(#{prcsFrTm},'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{prcsToTm},'HH24:MI:SS') )
insert into prdt_stc( prdt_inx, prdt_lot, prdt_fg, prdt_cd, indica_deta_no, prdt_dt ) values( prdtseq.nextval, #{prdtLot}, 'C', #{prdtCd}, #{indicaDetaNo}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from eqm order by eqm_cd
